page.title: 12Church and Sunday School
page.content: Johnstonebridge Church lies down beside the River Annan quite a distance from the houses that make up Johnstonebridge. It can be seen quite clearly from the A74 Dual Carriageway. The minister died in 1984 and so far no new minister has been appointed. The charge is shared at the present between two temporary ministers. There are six people in the church choir.The doctor plays the organ and trains the choir. The children go to church but after the first two hymns they leave the service and go upstairs to Sunday School.There are two teachers and about eighteen children in Sunday School.
